Coco Palm Bodu Hithi (Free dinners)

HOTEL STAR RATING:
Visit Hotel Website
Enquire About The Package
Deal Expiry: September 30, 2018

INCLUDES:

  • 7 nights staying at the Coco Palm Bodu Hithi in a Water Villa (Overwater with Pool)
  • Meet and greet at the airport by hotel representatives
  • Return speed boat transfers to the Coco Palm Bodu Hithi
  • American breakfast daily for 2 adults
  • Dinner daily at Air Restaurant.for 2 Adults
  • Only Honeymooners will also receive Cake, Bottle of Wine and Bed decoration

Travel From: 01 - 31 Aug, 2018

 

Travel Validity 01 May – 31 Jul, 2018   
  • Island Villa (wIth Pool) $2,959 per person
  • Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $3,399 per person
  • Escape Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $4.459 per person
Travel From: 01 – 31 Aug, 2018   
  • Island Villa (wIth Pool)  $2,579 per person
  • Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $2,999 per person
  • Escape Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $3,919 per person
Travel From: 01 Sep – 31 Oct, 2018   
  • Island Villa (wIth Pool)  $2,969 per person
  • Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $3,479 per person
  • Escape Water Villa (Overwater with Pool) $4,329 per person

Note: Hotels can change room prices or release discounted deals at any time. Please send us an inquiry for the best available prices.

Bodu Hithi Island, in North Malé Atoll, is our beautiful Maldivian home. The rhythm of life here is serene. The essential tropical mood stimulates and refreshes the senses. And the mystery of the House Reef meets the open elegance of pristine palm-fringed beaches. That the Malé International Airport is only 40 minutes away feels unreal.

Coco Bodu Hithi reflects the Island’s character in its every dimension. Our resort is your chic retreat. Reconnect with yourself, your loved ones and the wonder of the natural world. Remind yourself what time out and travel should feel like. Breathe the clean, sea air. Meet the Hawksbill turtles. Witness the peaceful majesty of the native Nurse sharks. Explore the exotic colours of the reef’s inhabitants. Swim with Manta rays. Take a sunset cruise across calm waters. Sink your toes into the white sand and ease yourself into island life and its relaxing, dreamy pace. All of this is yours, at Coco Bodu Hithi.

Prices are per person, based on twin share and in AUD Dollars.

See terms and conditions below:

  • Prices are per person, twin share, inclusive of all pre-payable taxes and subject to availability at time of booking.
  • Valid for sales & travel as specified.
  • All prices are subject to change at any time without notice.
  • Conditions, amendment and cancellation fees apply.
  • Free nights & discounts are already included in costs.
  • Travel insurance is strongly recommended.
